mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.post AS "post", a.content AS "content", a.exe_date AS "exeDate", a.lead_text AS "leadText", a.main_lead_text AS "mainLeadText", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.files AS "files", a.project_id AS "project.id", u3.name AS "user.name", o4.name AS "office.name", p5.name AS "project.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_project_impl( id, proc_ins_id, user_id, office_id, post, content, exe_date, lead_text, main_lead_text, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, files, project_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{user.id}, #{office.id}, #{post}, #{content}, #{exeDate}, #{leadText}, #{mainLeadText}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{files}, #{project.id} )
